Name: Hotel Spring
About the game: A first-person puzzle mystery game with 3D controls and a focus on atmosphere and immersion You awaken one morning while travelling and discover that you are trapped inside your hotel room. There are puzzles and oddly placed items hidden throughout the room, andâ€¦a talking dog sitting on your bed. You must search deep within to solve the puzzles and the mystery that has engulfed you. This game was almost entirely created in five weeks as an educational and experimental project. Please enjoy. Features Mind-bending puzzles 3D movement and item manipulation Multiple endings
